becominghuman.book.mindandbody.name: Mind and body
becominghuman.book.mindandbody.landing_t: So you want to get to know your little human huh? Well, then, you've come to the right place.
Into the depths of a players mind!
becominghuman.book.mindandbody.entry.bod: Going to write stuff about your body here!
becominghuman.book.mindandbody.entry.min: Going to write stuff about your mind here!
